item.title: Running Rabbit
item.description: Run the container docker run -d --name go-rabbit -p 5672:5672 -p 15672:15672 rabbitmq:3-management I named the container “go-rabbit” in this example. As soon as the container has been created you can run the container again: docker start go-rabbit Connect to the management console on http://localhost:15672 and connect to amqp on port 5672.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is the obligatory first post used to test out publishing and the blog engine itself.
